name: We Need To Go Deeper - Buried Treasure DLC
detailed_description:
Want to see and hear things long buried? Dive even deeper and see all the juicy content that didn't make the cut in We Need To Go Deeper with the Buried Treasure DLC!

Here's a look at what's included in Buried Treasure:



A 150+ Page Digital Art Book written by WNTGD artist Nick Lives. Including concept art, mockups, and scrapped content, even the ugly stuff for an authentic look behind the scenes. See how the game developed over the course of 6 years with developer commentary and artist notes. Comes in PDF form.



A 36 track Extended Soundtrack! Comes with the full in-game OST alongside 13 cut tracks from throughout development! Featuring the musical talents of Jake Lives, Jordan Farr, David Johnsen and Rebecca Mijares.

short_description: An Official Artbook and Extended Soundtrack for We Need To Go Deeper!
